summary: RE: YOUR #00V350000  I HAVE EXPERIENCED THE PROBLEM WITH ME FORD CONTOUR FOR 2 YEARS FORD REFUSES TO FIX BECAUSE THEY ONLY COVER THE PROBLEM UP TO 100,000 MILES.  IT TAKES ME UP TO 25 MINUTES TO FILL MY GAS TANK BECAUSE OF THIS PROBLEM. I HAVE HAD ONE GAS STATION ATTENDANT ASK ME NOT TO FUEL AT HIS STATION UNTIL I GET IT FIXED.   I DON'T HAVE THE EXTRA MONEY TO FIX. $300.00 PLUS.  IT IS A FAULTY PART WHY IS IT NOT FIXED?    *NLM
